message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its benefits, I'm asking for $14,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position on the budget.  I could come down a bit to $14,000.  I think that's a fair offer considering the value this product will bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. I'd like to propose a price of $13,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
